### Checklist

- [ ] All scores have at least 1 evidence source
- [ ] Evidence is from the last 12 months (or marked low confidence)
- [ ] Confidence levels accurately reflect evidence strength
- [ ] Methodology is clearly explained for each criterion
- [ ] All 5 dimensions evaluated with 3+ criteria each
- [ ] At least 5 use case ratings provided
- [ ] Strengths (3+) and limitations (2+) listed
- [ ] Metadata section completed
- [ ] Validation passes (`npm run validate`)
- [ ] No conflicts of interest (or disclosed below)

### Conflicts of Interest

- [ ] I have no conflicts of interest
- [ ] I disclose the following:

### Evidence Quality

<!-- Rate your confidence in the evaluation -->
- [ ] High - Multiple recent sources, direct testing
- [ ] Medium - Single authoritative source or slightly dated
- [ ] Low - Limited evidence, needs community review
